name: Nature's Ravages, Greater
target: corpse of creature whose total number of HD does not exceed your caster level
text: This spell functions like nature’s ravages, except the target corpse ages a number of years equal to up to 1 year per caster level (maximum 20 years at 20th level).
text_zh: 此法术如同自然蹂躏般作用，除了目标尸体腐朽的年数，至多等同于1年/等级 (最长20年/20等)。
